mod.name: TheChaser
mod.description: A character mod adds The Chaser!

cards.name: Bloody Wind
cards.description: Apply 3 thechaser:Bleeding to ALL enemies.

cards.name: Bloody Wind+
cards.description: Apply 4 thechaser:Bleeding to ALL enemies.

cards.name: Camouflage
cards.description: Gain 1 thechaser:Proxy 3 times.

cards.name: Camouflage+
cards.description: Gain 1 thechaser:Proxy 4 times.

cards.name: Followup Slash
cards.description:
Ethereal. Deal 2 damage twice.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Followup Slash+
cards.description:
Ethereal. Deal 3 damage twice.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Knife Throw
cards.description: Trigger thechaser:Targeting 3 times.

cards.name: Knife Throw+
cards.description: Trigger thechaser:Targeting 4 times.

cards.name: Sequence Flow
cards.description:
Ethereal. Deal 2 damage.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Sequence Flow+
cards.description:
Ethereal. Deal 3 damage.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Throwing Knife
cards.description:
Ethereal.
Deal 3 damage to a random enemy. Enemies affected by thechaser:Targeting are prioritized. Exhaust.

cards.name: Throwing Knife+
cards.description:
Ethereal.
Deal 5 damage to a random enemy. Enemies affected by thechaser:Targeting are prioritized. Exhaust.

cards.name: Defend
cards.description: Gain 5 Block.

cards.name: Defend+
cards.description: Gain 8 Block.

cards.name: Flawed Stealth
cards.description:
Gain 8 Block.
Gain 1 Frail.

cards.name: Flawed Stealth+
cards.description:
Gain 11 Block.
Gain 1 Frail.

cards.name: Reactive Shot
cards.description: Deal 3 damage and apply 2 thechaser:Targeting to a random enemy.

cards.name: Reactive Shot+
cards.description: Deal 4 damage and apply 3 thechaser:Targeting to a random enemy.

cards.name: Strike
cards.description: Deal 6 damage.

cards.name: Strike+
cards.description: Deal 9 damage.

cards.name: Aggravate
cards.description:
Gain 8 Block.
Trigger thechaser:Bleeding once on all enemies affected by thechaser:Bleeding.

cards.name: Aggravate+
cards.description:
Gain 11 Block.
Trigger thechaser:Bleeding once on all enemies affected by thechaser:Bleeding.

cards.name: Alertness
cards.description:
Gain 9 Block.
Gain thechaser:Proxy 1 times.
thechaser:Quickstep 1.

cards.name: Alertness+
cards.description:
Gain 12 Block.
Gain thechaser:Proxy 2 times.
thechaser:Quickstep 2.

cards.name: Blitzkrieg
cards.description:
Deal 5 damage.
Apply 1 thechaser:Blindsided.

cards.name: Blitzkrieg+
cards.description:
Deal 6 damage.
Apply 2 thechaser:Blindsided.

cards.name: Brass Tacks
cards.description: Apply 7 thechaser:Bleeding.

cards.name: Brass Tacks+
cards.description: Apply 10 thechaser:Bleeding.

cards.name: Continuous Slash
cards.description:
Deal 2 damage twice.
thechaser:Swift: Add 1 Followup Slash into your hand.

cards.name: Continuous Slash+
cards.description:
Deal 3 damage twice.
thechaser:Swift: Add 1 Followup Slash+ into your hand.

cards.name: Draw Knives
cards.description: Add 3 Throwing Knife into your hand.

cards.name: Draw Knives+
cards.description: Add 4 Throwing Knife into your hand.

cards.name: Fatal Blitz
cards.description:
Deal 15 damage.
Apply 5 thechaser:Bleeding.

cards.name: Fatal Blitz+
cards.description:
Deal 17 damage.
Apply 7 thechaser:Bleeding.

cards.name: Illusionary Strike
cards.description:
Deal 15 damage.
If you are Weak, gain [E] [E].

cards.name: Illusionary Strike+
cards.description:
Deal 20 damage.
If you are Weak, gain [E] [E].

cards.name: Inertial Strike
cards.description:
Deal 7 damage.
Deals additional damage equal to the amount of cards played this turn.

cards.name: Inertial Strike+
cards.description:
Deal 10 damage.
Deals additional damage equal to the amount of cards played this turn.

cards.name: Leave a Mark
cards.description: Deal 6 damage and apply 1 thechaser:Targeting to ALL enemies.

cards.name: Leave a Mark+
cards.description: Deal 9 damage and apply 1 thechaser:Targeting to ALL enemies.

cards.name: Malicious Trick
cards.description:
Gain 8 Block.
Trigger thechaser:Targeting 2 times.

cards.name: Malicious Trick+
cards.description:
Gain 10 Block.
Trigger thechaser:Targeting 3 times.

cards.name: Nullify Defenses
cards.description: Apply 1 thechaser:Blindsided and thechaser:Targeting to ALL enemies.

cards.name: Nullify Defenses+
cards.description: Apply 2 thechaser:Blindsided and thechaser:Targeting to ALL enemies.

cards.name: Open Vein
cards.description:
Deal 6 damage.
Apply 4 thechaser:Bleeding.

cards.name: Open Vein+
cards.description:
Deal 8 damage.
Apply 5 thechaser:Bleeding.

cards.name: Pass Through
cards.description: Gain 7 Block. If you have played an Attack on an enemy affected by thechaser:Targeting this turn, draw 2 cards.

cards.name: Pass Through+
cards.description: Gain 10 Block. If you have played an Attack on an enemy affected by thechaser:Targeting this turn, draw 2 cards.

cards.name: Preparation
cards.description: Draw 2 cards. If this card is the first card you play this turn, draw 1 more card.

cards.name: Preparation+
cards.description: Draw 3 cards. If this card is the first card you play this turn, draw 1 more card.

cards.name: Pursuit
cards.description: Deal 8 damage. Draw 1 card for each enemy affected by thechaser:Targeting.

cards.name: Pursuit+
cards.description: Deal 11 damage. Draw 1 card for each enemy affected by thechaser:Targeting.

cards.name: Stalling
cards.description:
Deal 9 damage.
Gain thechaser:Proxy 1 times.
thechaser:Quickstep 1.

cards.name: Stalling+
cards.description:
Deal 12 damage.
Gain thechaser:Proxy 2 times.
thechaser:Quickstep 2.

cards.name: Thornmail
cards.description:
Gain 8 Block.
Apply 3 thechaser:Bleeding to ALL enemies.

cards.name: Thornmail+
cards.description:
Gain 10 Block.
Apply 4 thechaser:Bleeding to ALL enemies.

cards.name: Watch
cards.description:
Apply 5 thechaser:Targeting.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Watch+
cards.description:
Apply 8 thechaser:Targeting.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Armorslayer
cards.description: Remove ALL stacks of thechaser:Targeting on the enemy. Apply Vulnerable, Weak, and thechaser:Bleeding equal to the amount removed. Exhaust.

cards.name: Armorslayer+
cards.description: Apply Vulnerable, Weak, and thechaser:Bleeding equal to the amount of thechaser:Targeting on the enemy. Exhaust.

cards.name: Blade Genesis
cards.description: Whenever you play a Skill that doesn't cost 0, add 1 Throwing Knife to your hand.

cards.name: Blade Genesis+
cards.description: Whenever you play a Skill that doesn't cost 0, add 1 Throwing Knife to your hand.

cards.name: Chaser's Luck
cards.description:
Gain 4 Block.
thechaser:Swift: Reduce the cost of a random card in your hand to 0 this turn.

cards.name: Chaser's Luck+
cards.description:
Gain 7 Block.
thechaser:Swift: Reduce the cost of a random card in your hand to 0 this turn.

cards.name: Chaser's Trick
cards.description:
Draw 1 card.
If it's an Attack, trigger thechaser:Targeting 2 times.

cards.name: Chaser's Trick+
cards.description:
Draw 1 card.
If it's an Attack, trigger thechaser:Targeting 3 times.

cards.name: Combat Spacing
cards.description: Whenever you trigger thechaser:Targeting, gain 1 Block.

cards.name: Combat Spacing+
cards.description: Whenever you trigger thechaser:Targeting, gain 2 Block.

cards.name: Counter Manoeuvre
cards.description: Gain 6 Block X times. Trigger thechaser:Targeting X times.

cards.name: Counter Manoeuvre+
cards.description: Gain 8 Block X times. Trigger thechaser:Targeting X times.

cards.name: Deceptive Defense
cards.description:
Gain 8 Block.
If you are Frail, double the amount of Block gained.

cards.name: Deceptive Defense+
cards.description:
Gain 8 Block.
If you are Frail, triple the amount of Block gained.

cards.name: Deceptive Strike
cards.description:
Deal 9 damage.
If you are Weak, deal double damage.

cards.name: Deceptive Strike+
cards.description:
Deal 9 damage.
If you are Weak, deal triple damage.

cards.name: Disguise
cards.description:
Gain 8 Block.
Repeat for each unique debuff on you.

cards.name: Disguise+
cards.description:
Gain 10 Block.
Repeat for each unique debuff on you.

cards.name: Evasive Fall
cards.description:
Gain 15 Block.
Gain 2 Weak.

cards.name: Evasive Fall+
cards.description:
Gain 18 Block.
Gain 1 Weak.

cards.name: Flexibility
cards.description:
Choose two:
Trigger thechaser:Targeting 3 times; gain thechaser:Proxy 3 times; apply 3 thechaser:Bleeding to ALL enemies.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Flexibility+
cards.description:
Choose two:
Trigger thechaser:Targeting 4 times; gain thechaser:Proxy 4 times; apply 4 thechaser:Bleeding to ALL enemies.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Gale Strike
cards.description: Deal 3 damage X times to ALL enemies. Trigger thechaser:Targeting X times.

cards.name: Gale Strike+
cards.description: Deal 6 damage X times to ALL enemies. Trigger thechaser:Targeting X times.

cards.name: Gore Scars
cards.description:
Deal 7 damage.
If the enemy has thechaser:Bleeding, trigger it once.

cards.name: Gore Scars+
cards.description:
Deal 10 damage.
If the enemy has thechaser:Bleeding, trigger it twice.

cards.name: Grand Plan
cards.description: Whenever you apply a debuff to yourself, gain 1 Strength.

cards.name: Grand Plan+
cards.description: Whenever you apply a debuff to yourself, gain 2 Strength.

cards.name: Hack Away
cards.description: Deal 2 damage 6 times.

cards.name: Hack Away+
cards.description: Deal 3 damage 6 times.

cards.name: Hidden Dagger
cards.description:
Gain 3 Block. Add 1 Throwing Knife into your hand.
thechaser:Swift: Upgrade ALL Throwing Knife cards in your hand.

cards.name: Hidden Dagger+
cards.description:
Gain 3 Block. Add 2 Throwing Knife into your hand.
thechaser:Swift: Upgrade ALL Throwing Knife cards in your hand.

cards.name: Internal Hemorrhage
cards.description:
Apply 6 thechaser:Bleeding and 2 Weak to ALL enemies.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Internal Hemorrhage+
cards.description:
Apply 9 thechaser:Bleeding and 2 Weak to ALL enemies.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Open Sore
cards.description: At the start of your turn, apply 3 thechaser:Bleeding to ALL enemies.

cards.name: Open Sore+
cards.description: At the start of your turn, apply 5 thechaser:Bleeding to ALL enemies.

cards.name: Paralyze
cards.description:
Enemy loses Strength equal to the amount of unique debuffs on them.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Paralyze+
cards.description:
Enemy loses Strength equal to the amount of unique debuffs on them.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Penetrate
cards.description: Deal 7 damage and apply 2 Vulnerable. If the enemy is already Vulnerable, apply 2 thechaser:Blindsided instead.

cards.name: Penetrate+
cards.description: Deal 9 damage and apply 3 Vulnerable. If the enemy is already Vulnerable, apply 3 thechaser:Blindsided instead.

cards.name: Piercing Blows
cards.description: Whenever you deal damage by triggering thechaser:Targeting, deal 2 additional damage.

cards.name: Piercing Blows+
cards.description: Whenever you deal damage by triggering thechaser:Targeting, deal 3 additional damage.

cards.name: Pluck Out Daggers
cards.description:
Costs 1 [E] less for each time you have triggered thechaser:Targeting this turn.
Deal 5 damage 3 times.

cards.name: Pluck Out Daggers+
cards.description:
Costs 1 [E] less for each time you have triggered thechaser:Targeting this turn.
Deal 7 damage 3 times.

cards.name: Replicating Daggers
cards.description: At the start of your turn, add a Throwing Knife into your hand and apply 1 thechaser:Targeting to a random enemy.

cards.name: Replicating Daggers+
cards.description:
Innate.
At the start of your turn, add a Throwing Knife into your hand and apply 1 thechaser:Targeting to a random enemy.

cards.name: Slash Sequence
cards.description:
Deal 3 damage.
Add 1 Sequence Flow into your hand.
thechaser:Swift: Deal 3 damage 2 times.

cards.name: Slash Sequence+
cards.description:
Deal 3 damage.
Add 2 Sequence Flow into your hand.
thechaser:Swift: Deal 3 damage 2 times.

cards.name: Spirit of Conquest
cards.description:
Gain Strength equal to the cumulative stacks of ALL debuffs you have.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Spirit of Conquest+
cards.description: Gain Strength equal to the cumulative stacks of ALL debuffs you have.

cards.name: Strong Bulwark
cards.description:
Gain 1 Strength.
Gain 1 Dexterity.

cards.name: Strong Bulwark+
cards.description:
Gain 2 Strength.
Gain 2 Dexterity.

cards.name: Take Initiative
cards.description:
Gain [E] [E].
At the start of your next turn, draw 2 less card.

cards.name: Take Initiative+
cards.description:
Gain [E] [E].
At the start of your next turn, draw 1 less card.

cards.name: Test the Waters
cards.description: Deal 10 damage and apply 2 Vulnerable to ALL enemies.

cards.name: Test the Waters+
cards.description: Deal 12 damage and apply 3 Vulnerable to ALL enemies.

cards.name: Throes of Rage
cards.description:
Deal 12 damage and apply 3 thechaser:Blindsided.
Gain 1 Vulnerable.

cards.name: Throes of Rage+
cards.description:
Deal 16 damage and apply 4 thechaser:Blindsided.
Gain 1 Vulnerable.

cards.name: Unstable Defense
cards.description: Gain 30 Block and 1 Vulnerable.

cards.name: Unstable Defense+
cards.description: Gain 30 Block and 1 thechaser:Blindsided.

cards.name: Weakpoint Strike
cards.description: Deal 4 damage. Repeat for each unique debuff on the enemy.

cards.name: Weakpoint Strike+
cards.description: Deal 6 damage. Repeat for each unique debuff on the enemy.

cards.name: Win the Exchange
cards.description:
Deal 5 damage.
If the enemy has thechaser:Blindsided, gain [E] and draw 1 card.

cards.name: Win the Exchange+
cards.description:
Deal 8 damage.
If the enemy has thechaser:Blindsided, gain [E] and draw 1 card.

cards.name: Winds of Fury
cards.description:
Trigger thechaser:Targeting 1 times.
Permanently increase this card's thechaser:Targeting trigger amount by 1.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Winds of Fury+
cards.description:
Trigger thechaser:Targeting 1 times.
Permanently increase this card's thechaser:Targeting trigger amount by 1.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Wither
cards.description: Apply 99 Weak. Exhaust.

cards.name: Wither+
cards.description: Apply 99 Weak. Exhaust.

cards.description:
Gain [E].
Draw 1 card for each unique debuff on ALL enemies.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Absolute Edge+
cards.description:
Gain [E] [E].
Draw 1 card for each unique debuff on ALL enemies.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Acceleration
cards.description: Whenever you play an Attack, gain 1 temporary Strength.

cards.name: Acceleration+
cards.description: Whenever you play an Attack, gain 1 temporary Strength.

cards.name: Bloodhound
cards.description:
Deal 3 damage to ALL enemies. Trigger thechaser:Targeting equal to the amount of cards played this turn.
End your turn.

cards.name: Bloodhound+
cards.description:
Deal 8 damage to ALL enemies. Trigger thechaser:Targeting equal to the amount of cards played this turn.
End your turn.

cards.name: Chaser's Guard
cards.description: Gain 4 Block for each unique debuff on ALL enemies.

cards.name: Chaser's Guard+
cards.description: Gain 6 Block for each unique debuff on ALL enemies.

cards.name: Confounding Assault
cards.description: Dealing damage by triggering thechaser:Targeting also applies thechaser:Blindsided.

cards.name: Confounding Assault+
cards.description: Dealing damage by triggering thechaser:Targeting also applies thechaser:Blindsided.

cards.name: Cruel Ruin
cards.description:
Deal 16 damage.
Apply 2 Vulnerable, Weak, and thechaser:Blindsided.

cards.name: Cruel Ruin+
cards.description:
Deal 20 damage.
Apply 3 Vulnerable, Weak, and thechaser:Blindsided.

cards.name: Dual Wielding
cards.description: Whenever you trigger thechaser:Targeting this turn, trigger it twice.

cards.name: Dual Wielding+
cards.description: Whenever you trigger thechaser:Targeting this turn, trigger it twice.

cards.name: High-Speed Advance
cards.description:
thechaser:Quickstep 10.
thechaser:Swift: Apply 10 thechaser:Bleeding to ALL enemies.
Exhaust.

cards.name: High-Speed Advance+
cards.description:
thechaser:Quickstep 15.
thechaser:Swift: Apply 15 thechaser:Bleeding to ALL enemies.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Joy From Misfortune
cards.description:
Heal HP equal to the amount of times you have triggered thechaser:Targeting this turn.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Joy From Misfortune+
cards.description:
Retain.
Heal HP equal to the amount of times you have triggered thechaser:Targeting this turn.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Lust for Power
cards.description: All your buffs count as debuffs, for the purposes of effects which check for debuffs on you.

cards.name: Lust for Power+
cards.description: All your buffs count as debuffs, for the purposes of effects which check for debuffs on you.

cards.name: Neckcutter
cards.description:
Ethereal. Deal 14 damage.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Neckcutter+
cards.description:
Ethereal. Deal 19 damage.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Perfected Stealth
cards.description:
thechaser:Hide for 2 turns.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Perfected Stealth+
cards.description:
thechaser:Hide for 3 turns.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Phrenitis
cards.description:
Apply 1 Weak, Vulnerable, Frail, Poison, thechaser:Bleeding, thechaser:Targeting, thechaser:Proxy, and thechaser:Blindsided.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Phrenitis+
cards.description:
Apply 1 Weak, Vulnerable, Frail, Poison, thechaser:Bleeding, thechaser:Targeting, thechaser:Proxy, and thechaser:Blindsided.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Preemptive Offense
cards.description: At the start of your turn, draw 1 additional card and trigger thechaser:Targeting once.

cards.name: Preemptive Offense+
cards.description: At the start of your turn, draw 1 additional card and trigger thechaser:Targeting once.

cards.name: Prepay
cards.description: This turn, your next X cards cost 0. Exhaust.

cards.name: Prepay+
cards.description: This turn, your next X cards cost 0. Draw X cards. Exhaust.

cards.name: Sawblades
cards.description: Whenever you play a card, apply 1 thechaser:Bleeding to ALL enemies.

cards.name: Sawblades+
cards.description: Innate. Whenever you play a card, apply 1 thechaser:Bleeding to ALL enemies.

cards.name: Shakedown
cards.description:
Deal 10 damage.
Gain 10 Gold.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Shakedown+
cards.description:
Deal 15 damage.
Gain 15 Gold.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Spectre Form
cards.description: At the start of your turn, increase damage dealt when triggering thechaser:Targeting by 2.

cards.name: Spectre Form+
cards.description: At the start of your turn, increase damage dealt when triggering thechaser:Targeting by 3.

relics.name: Shadowed Necklace
relics.description: At the start of each combat, apply 2 Targeting to a random enemy.
relics.flavorText: A necklace with a small glass bottle, created from the abyssal darkness.

relics.name: Scotch Stone
relics.description: Whenever you deal damage by triggering Targeting, deal 1 additional damage.
relics.flavorText: A fine-grained grey stone used for sharpening weapons.

relics.name: Box Cutter
relics.description: Your first Attack that triggers Targeting each turn triggers it twice.
relics.flavorText: A very peculiar sword. So peculiar, that its purpose is unknown.

relics.name: R-B0-7
relics.description: At the start of each turn, enemies which have debuffs lose 5 HP.
relics.flavorText: A dangerous secret weapon. Its lethality is complemented with an infamous drug.

relics.name: Acid Solution
relics.description: Whenever you play an Attack, if you are Weak, apply 1 Weak to the enemy. If you are Frail, remove all Block from the enemy.
relics.flavorText: Extremely corrosive. Hopefully no one else carelessly sprinkles this on something...or someone.

relics.name: Assassin's Cloak
relics.description: At the start of each combat, Hide for 2 turns.
relics.flavorText: This mass-produced cloak boasts the most reliable camouflage.

relics.name: Rusty Helmet
relics.description: At the start of each turn, apply 1 Blindsided to ALL enemies.
relics.flavorText: An old helmet used in wars of the past. It's unlikely to see use today.

relics.name: Broken Ticker
relics.description: At the start of each combat, apply Slow to ALL enemies.
relics.flavorText: It is already broken, yet a faint ticking can still be heard.

relics.name: Masked Shadows
relics.description: Replaces Shadowed Necklace. At the start of your turn, apply 1 Targeting to ALL enemies and trigger Targeting once.
relics.flavorText: Behind a mask, nobody can see the abyss.

relics.name: Pocket Knife
relics.description: After Target is triggered for the fourth time each turn, gain [E] .
relics.flavorText: A portable knife used to cut ropes.

relics.name: Letter of Request
relics.description: At the start of each combat, apply 3 Targeting to ALL enemies.
relics.flavorText: A letter of request from an unknown client.

keywords.name: Bleeding
keywords.description: Bleeding creatures lose HP at the start of their turn, then reduce Bleeding by half. Whenever you play an Attack, increase Bleeding by 1.

keywords.name: Blindsided
keywords.description: Target receives 15% more damage for each stack of Blindsided (up to a maximum of 4.)

keywords.name: Hide
keywords.description: ALL enemies become Stunned. Fades away after an Attack is played or Targeting is triggered.

keywords.name: Proxy
keywords.description: Target receives 5% more damage for each stack of Proxy.

keywords.name: Quickstep
keywords.description: Simulate playing cards, for use with Swift effects.

keywords.name: Swift
keywords.description: If you have played 4 or more cards this turn, trigger an additional effect.

keywords.name: Targeting
keywords.description: After a player or monster attacks, all creatures with Targeting take 2 damage.
